welcomePage.title: Unified Modeling Language 2.0
welcomePage.intro: UML2 is an EMF-based implementation of the UML 2.0 metamodel for the Eclipse platform.
welcomePage.item: Please Note The UML2 API and associated XMI schema are subject to (significant) change until the UML 2.0 Specification is finalized.
Learn More More information on UML2 is available at http://www.eclipse.org/uml2.
